channel.title: Project Milestones on Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Project Milestones on Hugo Relearn Theme

item.title: Fall 2023
item.description:
Overview

Below you can find the assignment descriptions for each of the project’s fall 2023 semester milestones. The appropriate slideshow can be seen under each milestone’s title.

Milestones

  • MS1 - Minimal Working System

    Progress made on the minimal working system and the associated slideshow

  • MS2 - 50% Working System

    Progress made on the 50% working system and the associated slideshow

  • MS3 - Final Working System

    Progress made on the final working system and the associated slideshow
